description: Skull stripping algorithm based on graph cuts.

wmmask_110.title: White matter mask flag
wmmask_110.description: Use voxels with intensity 110 as white matter mask (when applied on T1.mgz, FreeSurfer only)

mult_file.title: Mult filename
mult_file.description: Intersect the skull-stripped 'in_filename' and an existing skull-stripped volume specified by 'filename', storing the result in 'out_filename'.

threshold_value.title: Threshold value
threshold_value.description: Set threshold to value (%) of WM intensity, where the value should be >0 and <1; defaults to 0.40.

infile.title: Input file
infile.description: Input brain volume file, e.g. T1.mgz
